showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ The guy works at main counter I requested him that i‚Äôm waiting for the shower from the last 2 hours and he didn‚Äôt do anything and replied ** Step aside as he can‚Äôt do anything about this** 2 shower were needed to be clean from last 2 hour ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ I stopped here because there was no line for a shower. Figured I got lucky. Turns out the real wait is dealing with three clueless workers behind the counter doing absolutely nothing to help. Thanks for turning a no-wait stop into a time- ‚Ä¶

These peoples here workers just walking around like they dont work here just hanging in like nothing i was waiting for shower beeen an hour and no one was in shower and they just let 4 5 peoples waiting for that long like nothing nobody in ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ make some changes! The only thing your employees were doing was eating at 11:00 a.m. except the shower girl, she was cleaning), the inventory was ridiculous, I couldn't purchase anything that I wanted, stock was out! I'm sure you all ‚Ä¶
don‚Äôt stop here to sleep, if you need it. don‚Äôt stop here to shower or use the restrooms either because they‚Äôre both disgusting ü§© ‚Ä¶

People at this place don‚Äôt care computer is down and they don‚Äôt know how to do anything my company spends $1000‚Äôs of dollars every day at pilot and they act like they‚Äôll go broke if they don‚Äôt charge you for a shower
Don't stop here if you're trying to get a shower. All showers are empty but hasn't been cleaned waited 2 hours....still waiting

Parking was small. Shower was not clean. Had some guys face hairs all over the sink. My towel didn't smell clean. And the ladies room stall, looked like there was poo on it. The manager did give me my shower credit back, but would never ‚Ä¶

tried to get a shower. Wasn‚Äôt clean, it still had dirty towels and garbage in it. Couldn‚Äôt find the person who worked there. Fountain soda machine is completely disgusting. Worst one I‚Äôve seen yet. How is this ok?
Waiting for 15 minutes for somebody to clean a shower there. I ain't got all day pilot. This is one of the worst pilots in the system.

locations.title: Fort Kearney Trading Post
locations.content: Fort Kearney Trading Post may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText:
As usual, the inside of the store is clean and organized. Was able to get a shower for $15.
The staff were professional, helpful, and polite.  I always try and stop in here when passing through! Keep up the great work.

Good place with awful stuff, supervisor should change his stuff.
When I was in shower, cleaner started to knock the door and told me "OUT"...
It's ridiculous!!!
Clean nice little truck stop. Shower was great. Hot food. Lots of truck parking.

locations.title: Pilot Fuel Location - Bosselman Travel Center
locations.street: Pilot Fuel Location - Bosselman Travel Center 4.2(2
locations.content: Pilot Fuel Location - Bosselman Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: This has been a favorite of ours for a long time, any time we‚Äôre coming across I-80 we try to stop; usually to eat and often times grab a shower. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ staff and filled the fuel. Lots of free truck parking available. Store is big, many shower rooms are available, they accept Pilot Flying J rewards. Their coffee refill is cheaper than the regular Pilot Flying J sites. I had to do a reset ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and good selection of stuff. However I bought a shower and go in to see urine on the toilet seat and dirty toilet, soap on the shower handle, so I expect the rest of the cleaning isn‚Äôt done very thoroughly. But overall not a bad place ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ perfect so I took off a star for the beverage prices but otherwise everyone is nice and the service was great.  Shower was very clean with nice water pressure, gameroom for drivers, massage if you need one multiple take out restaurants and ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ to be here, so talking to him regarding my concerns, would have fallen on deaf ears.  The showers were probably some of the worst I've had in years.  Next to no hot water.  And I was definitely not looking for an ice bath yesterday.   The ‚Ä¶
One of the best Pilots in USA. Always you‚Äôll find clean , hot shower. They have about 22 showers. Big parking lot and a lot of diesel pumps to fuel. And wide variety of food and truck supplies.

‚Ä¶ were kinda rude.... and I've attached a picture of them asking for tips when I found hairs that weren't mine (hadn't even gotten in yet) in the shower and no Hershey kisses (not a huge deal but why offer it if you dont provide it lol)... ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ stop we have been to. It is unacceptable to have to stop at a place where you need a shower or to do laundry and the place to be nasty dirty and everything broken plus the workers are rude and lazy!!! Do better for our truck drivers ‚Ä¶
One of the best truck stops on the road! Everything inside is a little pricey but I never have problems getting parking or a shower! I wish the CB shop was still there.
‚Ä¶ inside store very nice many showers clean but !!!! ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ Additionally, I had to spend over an hour waiting in line just to use the shower facilities. This is unacceptable for a service station that drivers rely on during long trips. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ How that sound ü§û " Attention profesional drivers, we don't have any wait for the shower, please park your truck and come in have clean hot shower  " üòÇüòÇ because we dont provide soap / we are stealing it; we don't hygienic clean the towels ‚Ä¶

8/24/25 8:30 am. Bathrooms are filthy, store is dirty, food warmer food way past when it was supposed to of been thrown out, and their showers are down due to a ‚Äúwater heater‚Äù issue. The cashier refused to even let me take a cold shower ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ or car. 2 floors inside and very nice service. Good place to find parking when it's late at night so that is a plus. Subway inside. Shower are on the second floor just in case you can't find them. Over all good place to stay the night.

‚Ä¶ going great it has a gas station food station sUBway etc it also have truck stops much more here easily park upto 50 trucks and also available small trucks parts and all oil's and refill.. Here shower is available and much more features..
They still haven't fixed the dryers. I spent an hour waiting in line to get into the shower. Horrible place.
Clean shower water not that hot in shower 5. Pumps are clean store look nice

Planned to start my day early with a shower but apparently I have to wait till 7am (it‚Äôs 0440hrs) because they only have one person working. I‚Äôm not sure why he needs to also be able to be at the shower area to let you use the ‚Äúalready ‚Ä¶

Giving 5 stars for the showers alone! The water pressure was absolutely amazing (shower 5 and I hope to find out they are ALL like that!) and the water was hot, hot! All of the employees we encountered were super nice! We will be returning!

‚Ä¶ it was full in the lot, even walked outside with us when it was super windy and snowy to showed us how to parked our truck to avoid obstruct others, we really  appreciate it! Also, the shower rooms are big and clean! Highly recommended!

showerReviews.reviewText: Last time I was here they took 45 minutes to clean a shower when I was the only one waiting and now I come in and all the fuel pumps are demolished and the restaurant is closed‚Ä¶. It‚Äôs basically just a crappy restaurant area. ‚Ä¶

Why does Sapp Bros have a camera in their shower/bathroom area? I'm very concerned about this! I asked the attendant, and he had no idea why it was in the restroom. I don't know if there in all of them or just #4. He said it could be a door ‚Ä¶
We've been to travel stations all over the country, and this one has THE best showers. So clean, two shower heads!!!, very spacious. Lovely employees as well! Best travel center in the US!

‚Ä¶ and this is my go to station. Friendly people that remember your name and a nice restaurant, though meal prices are a bit high. Showers are free with 50 gallons of diesel purchased and always shining clean. Shower #4 is the best because it ‚Ä¶

Went in to take shower was told that no one on the cleaning crew showed up to work. Okay... no shower. Decided to get something to eat. Ordered scrambled eggs, sausage and pancakes. Scrambled eggs were raw. The sausage wasn't a patty or ‚Ä¶

Walked in going to take a shower and get a bite to eat. When I walked in 6 people in line. Non English speaking person at the register. Two ther employees standing around occupying space.

What a waste of time.

This  place is  following  apart, bathroom  is dirty  no shower  for truckers because  no one  to clean  them  ,diesel  fuel  pumps  are leaking  at the handles don't  have  have  the  items  on the  menu out of stock. Truckers  do your ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ with what a bidet is, it's a European toilet that has the function of spraying water on your netherland areas so that you can clean them. Think miniature shower every time you use a toilet. And there is even has a drying function. ‚Ä¶
Good shower, decent C-store, but the best part was the restaurant great women working, good convo, good personality, and they hand made some of the pies they sale. Overall great time
‚Ä¶ IF YOU DONT WANT TO CLEAN A SHOWER DONT WORK AT A TRUCK STOP, THAT HAS SHOWERS. ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Diesel shower and all within an hour! Saved 80 bucks on 200 gallons vs the Sapp bros up the road!!

They have the best price for fuel every time! No loyalty card but saving this much on fuel makes up for it. 100 gal for a shower, towel provided but bring a washcloth and soap. The restaurant is excellent but closes at 8pm, call ahead and ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Truckers ,  you dont wanna make an attempt of taking a shower there.   Light bulbs are out,  u will not get a good towel, the faucets will look greasy, the wall will have a hole, the room will look super gross and dark. ‚Ä¶
I wouldn't take a shower here but I love the restaurant. Possibly the best Indian food on the road.

3 times in a row i had my disgusting shower,with remains in the toilet bowl.
Even yesterday after asking 3 times to clean,et wasn't done!!!
Wish fuel islands were open 24 hours,other then that great place for cheap fuel and a quick shower,everything a trucker needs!!
Excellent customer service and a HOT shower!!

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ Clean hot showers($12.00) Good selection of snack foods and drinks. Fantastic employees.  60 gallons of fuel gets a free shower.(Not with Mudflap app). ‚Ä¶
Place is okay.  Stopped for fuel and a shower but the shower is not free if you use Mudflap. Dumbest thing I‚Äôve ever heard.   And don‚Äôt say there is no record and my post doesn‚Äôt make any sense

Stopped for fuel and a shower. I didn‚Äôt get fuel because it was free with the purchase of fuel. If you‚Äôre stopping for Mudflap go few more miles and avoid this stop. Greedy truck stop owner! Save money somewhere else that offers shower with ‚Ä¶

It‚Äôs a clean place ! And that‚Äôs where the good stops! I pumped 650$ and because I used Mudflap I had to pay for a shower ! The lady said the owners say we get enough of a discount,so you have to pay! I‚Äôm willing to bet most of the truck ‚Ä¶

Came here Friday evening about 200 gallons of fuel went back in tonight Saturday to take a shower the girl said because I didn't take it the same day she was going to charge me $12 to take a shower and if I didn't like it I could just leave ‚Ä¶

Stopped in at 1 a.m. to take a shower. Was told by the lady behind the counter that there was no clean showers and she was to busy. All while sitting on a stool and talking on her cell phone. This is after I fueled up putting 207 gallons on ‚Ä¶
Outdated but clean. Showers are $12, towels and bodywash is included. I took a fairly long shower and had hot water for at least 20 minutes until it started to cool down.
I got a shower for $10 and I got some biscuits and gravy with hash browns for $9. Staff are friendly. Showers and restaurant are clean and freshly painted. No complaints.

12$ for one shower/ one person
20$ for couple and one shower
24$ for 2 showers? How does any of that make sense. Will never buy anything from here again and no I walked away from the shower
